branchCategory.name: SV Accessories
branchCategory.description: <p>Replacement parts and components for SV1000 ~ SV4000 Solenoid Valves.</p>
branchCategory.bullets: <ul> <li>Replacement parts and components for SV1000 ~ SV4000 Solenoid Valves.</li></ul>

branchItem.name: SV1000/2000/3000/4000, Tie-Rod
branchItem.description: Tie Rod Accessory for the SV series Type 10: Tie-rod Base Manifold.

branchItem.name: SV1000/2000/3000, SUP / EXH Block Disk, Tie-Rod Base Type 10
branchItem.description: Supply / Exhaust port block disk for Series SV Type 10: Tie-Rod Base Manifold. By placing a SUP block disk in a manifold valve’s pressure supply passage, two different high and low pressures can be supplied to one manifold. By installing an EXH block disk in a manifold valve’s exhaust passage, the valve’s exhaust can be separated so that it will not affect other valves. It can also be used on a manifold with mixed positive pressure and vacuum. (Two pieces are required to block EXH on both sides. However, Series SV1000 and 2000 type 10 manifolds require only one piece.)

branchItem.name: SV1000/2000/3000/4000, Clamp Assembly
branchItem.description: Clamp Assembly for DIN rail mounting Series SV Type 10: Tie-Rod Base Manifold.

branchItem.name: SV1000/2000/3000/4000, Connector Gasket
branchItem.description: Replacement gasket for where the valve solenoid connects to manifold block assembly.

branchItem.name: SV2000/4000, Roundhead Combination Mounting Screws
branchItem.description: <p>Various roundhead combination mounting screws for series SV2000, SV4000 valve manifolds. </p>

branchItem.name: SV1000/2000/3000/4000, Blanking Plate Assembly
branchItem.description: <p>Blanking plate for covering empty stations on series SV valve manifolds where valves will be added in the future, or for maintenance. </p>

branchItem.name: SV1000/2000/3000/4000, Manifold Block Assembly
branchItem.description: <P>Manifold block assembly for series SV1000/2000/3000/4000 solenoid valves. Multiple options for wiring and port size.</P>
